sentences.en: A new pet census showed that cats now outnumber dogs by a whisker (7 million to 6.9 million).
sentences.cn: 新的宠物普查显示出猫的数量略微超过了狗的数量（700万比690万）。
毕竟好的是多数,坏的是少数.

sentences.en: Blacks outnumber whites by better than 5 to 1.
sentences.cn: 黑人与白人的比例超过5:1.

sentences.en: Coffee shops even outnumber teahouses in some neighborhoods.
sentences.cn: 在某些地区,咖啡屋甚至比茶馆还多.

sentences.en: Donkeys outnumber cars in this landscape of tiny stone-walled fields.
sentences.cn: 在这片以石墙隔出巴掌大的农田的乡村，驴子比汽车还多。

sentences.en: Flats outnumber houses in this area.
sentences.cn: 这个地区公寓房比独栋房子多。
他的军队在数量上远远不及对方。

sentences.en: In war the heroes always outnumber the soldiers ten to one.
sentences.cn: 战争中,无名士兵总比英雄多的多.

sentences.en: Male online shoppers outnumber women, accounting for 55 percent.
sentences.cn: 男性网购客户数量超过女性顾客, 占55%.

sentences.en: Men outnumber women here in the ratio of three to one.
sentences.cn: 此地男子数量以三比一超过女子.

sentences.en: Net result: dogs now outnumber children aged 10 and under.
sentences.cn: 最终结果是,狗的数量现在超过了10岁和10岁以下孩子的数量.

sentences.en: Sergeants and corporals outnumber private soldiers.
sentences.cn: 中士和下士的人数超过了列兵。

sentences.en: Since that historic expedition questions about the moon still outnumber answers.
sentences.cn: 经过那次具有历史意义的探险后,关于月球问题仍然多于答案.

sentences.en: The former outnumber the latter by about a hundred to one.
sentences.cn: 前者在数量上超过后者,比率约为100:1.

sentences.en: The girls in the class outnumber the boys two to one.
sentences.cn: 那一班的女孩子比男孩子多一倍.

sentences.en: The most likely reason for this is that male plovers outnumber females.
sentences.cn: 导致这种现象最可能的原因是雄性?鸟比雌性多.

sentences.en: They outnumber the high elves and can outmaneuver most enemies.
sentences.cn: 他们的数量比高等精灵多,而且可以以策略制胜多数敌人.

trans.tran_en: to be more in number than another group
to be more in number than another group
